job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong><u>Job Summary:</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;We are looking for a Data Scientist responsible for maintaining fast growing datasets, developing custom data models, and extracting actionable insights to make Cercacor products more delightful and intuitive for customers.&nbsp;This position works in close collaboration with cross functional teams to influence product innovation.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Duties &amp; Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Build and expand machine learning models using NLP, classification, Neural Networks, etc. </p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Work with Engineers to integrate data from multiple sources and develop predictive algorithms.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Extract actionable insights from complex data sets and report insights via internal dashboards and visualization to Product teams for roadmap and feature decisions.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Review latest research papers and trends in the field of Artificial Intelligence and update team with new technologies.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Communicate findings and new trends with company leadership.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Conduct exploratory analysis and develop statistical models to answer key product usage and engagement questions. </p><ul><li>Help Product and Marketing teams use experimentation and cohorting to test assumptions and launch new marketing campaigns, features and product releases. </li><li>Partner with Product teams to define and benchmark metrics for new features launches and initiatives and help create a culture of measurement.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>Minimum Qualifications and Experience:&nbsp;</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Master’s degree or higher in computer science, statistics, electrical engineering or other related fields.</p><ul><li>Proficiency in using Matlab, and Python.</li><li>Proficiency in using data science toolkits such as Keras, Tensorflow, PyTorch, etc.</li></ul><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Practical experience in time series analysis and sequential modeling. </p><ul><li>Prior experience developing machine learning approaches for modeling and predicting user behaviors.</li></ul><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior experience building NLP pipelines for chatbots in a limited training data environment.</p><ul><li>Prior experience building REST APIs and interfacing applications with other 3rd party APIs.</li><li>Ability to work independently and with moderate supervision.</li><li>Exceptional organizational skills and problem-solving ability.</li><li>Good communication skills, both verbal and written.&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Desired Qualifications:</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience developing advanced prediction models with large dataset.</p><p></p>
